summary: Most frontend requirements appear implemented: single-page responsive nav (desktop + mobile), hero/about/services/contact sections, services cards with “Sales & Service”, product category listing, footer with quick links and placeholders, and UI references to generated images. Key gaps/risks are in the backend inquiry storage (not stable) and the backend ServiceInterest enum not matching the requested NK SYSTECH service interests. Image assets themselves are not evidenced as added under the required public path (diff omits some files).

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores inquiries in stable state and exposes a method to create an inquiry and a method to list inquiries.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend uses an in-memory Map and a mutable counter without stable persistence; no `stable var` or upgrade-safe persistence is shown, so inquiries would be lost on upgrade/reinstall and do not meet the 'stable state' AC.

missing_requirements.requirement: Service interest values should align to NK SYSTECH offerings (CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, Computers, Other) for dropdown submission/storage.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend ServiceInterest variant names are unrelated (energyTransition, renewableEnergyConsulting, etc.), and the frontend maps CCTV/workstations/etc. labels onto these unrelated backend enum variants, indicating the backend model does not actually represent the requested service interests.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend references the expected asset paths, but the diff summary does not include the actual added static image files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (some added files were omitted due to limits), so presence/placement cannot be verified from the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Service icons/illustrations image (nk-systech-service-icons.dim_1024x256.png) appears in the Services section/page.
missing_requirements.reason: ServicesSection uses lucide-react icons (Camera/Monitor/Network/Laptop/HardDrive) and does not show use of the required generated service-icons image asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity integration/hooks and actor creation logic for authenticated vs anonymous actors.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly says Internet Identity is allowed but not required for this site; the diff adds a full Internet Identity provider/hook and uses it for actor creation even though the site does not require auth.

hallucinated_features.description: Inquiry debug UI to view submitted inquiries directly in the Contact section.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request asks for a backend listing method for verification/testing; it does not request an on-page debug/inquiry table UI component.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional backend query methods beyond 'create inquiry' and 'list inquiries' (getInquiryById, getInquiriesByServiceInterest).
hallucinated_features.reason: Only create + list inquiries were required; extra query endpoints were added that were not requested.
